item.title: A computational approach to the ample cone of moduli spaces of curves
item.description: Abstract. We present an alternate proof, much quicker and more straightforward than the original one, of the celebrated F-conjecture on the ample cone of the moduli space $\overline{M}_{0,n}$ of stable rational curves with $n$ marked points in the case $n = 7$. Ancillary Material Macaulay2 package M07.m2. Macaulay2 script proof-M-0-5.m2 with proof of the F-conjecture for $n = 5$. Macaulay2 script proof-M-0-6.m2 with proof of the F-conjecture for $n = 6$.
